hiveArticle.title: Under the Tree
hiveArticle.body:
We all carve for this type of shade whenever we walk/run in sunlight to get some fresh air and protect ourselves from direct sunlight. These trees are like a lifeline for all of us and it's always our duty to protect them for our betterment.

![IMG_1183.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmPVZQ7xcFFUpRhw1NyXuxzeHgQvEQz7LTLvgsm5wKvud4/IMG_1183.jpg)

Camera | Canon 200 D
--- | ---
Lens |  EF-S 18-55mm
Aperture | F/4.5
Exposure | 1/250
ISO | 200

----
